June 14, 2012, Diana was a client of William (Bill)’s

I knew from my first introduction to Bill that I wanted to work with him. It was not just his striking presence that made him stand out amongst the dozens of actors I'd interviewed and auditioned, but his genuine warmth and enthusiastic yet respectful demeanor, which portrayed a true gentleman and intelligent professional. He was more interested in the project itself than what the project could do for him.And he proved to be everything one could hope for on set. He showed up each day promptly and ready to work, not just on his own character, but with anything that he could find to pitch in with. Nothing was too much effort and he jumped into every scene and take, with conviction and intent. But he was also more than happy to quickly change course if the director deemed it necessary.I am fortunate to have had the opportunity do know Bill as an actor and now as a dear friend. His professionalism is only matched by his integrity and loyalty.

January 14, 2014, Renae worked with William (Bill) in the same group

I had the honor of working with Renae on a commercial set and it is going to be difficult to mention all of her great qualities in this brief recommendation. First and foremost, it is obvious she has a passion for acting. She is able to take direction very well and deliver exactly what the Director is looking for. In our case,we were scene partners and we completed each direction in one take. Match that with a positive attitude and a near constant smile, and you have someone that many will want to work with !  I recommend you meet her yourself and you will see the truth in my words. Again, it was an honor to work with her and I sincerely recommend her for any production you may have in mind, whether it be film, commercial, live performance or print.  William Bill Connor

I have known Lynette for years. First time we met was on set and I was in character. She thought I was a mafia boss which made her nervous. I highly recommend Lynette if you want quality public relations and marketing for you or your business. If there is something going down in the area, Lynette is aware and connected. Add the fact that she has a fantastic personality and is beautiful, you have a winning combination. I am honored to say she is my friend !

summary: It is thought that the actor is typically supposed to "become the other" where the actor molds his or herself to the character.
